summary:
PL: Spolszczenie do moda "Portables" autorstwa beinz.
EN: This is Polish translation for "Portables" mod by beinz.
descriptionHtml:
PL: Spolszczenie do moda "[b]Portables[/b]" autorstwa [b]beinz[/b]. [u]Musisz posiadać zainstalowany [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81045]oryginalny mod[/url], inaczej jest to zbędne.[/u]
EN: This is Polish translation for "[b]Portables[/b]" mod by [b]beinz[/b]. [u]You must have installed [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81045]original mod[/url], if not, then it's useless.[/u]


     [color=#cc0000][b][u][size=6]INSTALACJA[/size][/u][/b][size=5] (PL)[/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*]Pobierz i zainstaluj [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81045]beinz's Portables[/url]﻿
[*]Pobierz i rozpakuj plik .zip
[*]Przenieś i zamień te dwa pliki w [twoja lokalizacja gry]\Data\Interface\translations
[/list]

﻿     [color=#cc0000][size=5][u]INSTALLATION[/u] (EN)[/size][/color]
[list=1]
[*]Download and install [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81045]beinz's Portables[/url]﻿
[*]Download and unpack .zip file
[*]Just put and replace these two files in [your skyrim directory]\Data\Interface\translations\

[/list]


[color=#3c78d8][size=4][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81045]beinz's Portables[/url]﻿[/b][/size][/color]
author: Dedri
